title: New: Carnivals – Departners
body:
Sheffield’s **Carnivals** could hardly sound less British, with their pronounced beats and tropical samples on new track _Departners_.

Four minutes of production bliss, it’s a musical journey that will guide you far from these sultry shores and leaves you wondering how something this good could come from such a seemingly contrasting area of the world. Check out _Departners_ below and grab a free download if you’re diggin’.

Four minutes of production bliss, it’s a musical journey that will guide you far from these sultry shores and leaves you wondering how something this good could come from such a seemingly contrasting area of the world. \[…\]
